Items.Title:
NEW YORK CITY COUNCIL FISCAL YEAR 2023 EXECUTIVE BUDGET HEARINGS

*Begins 10:00   - Public

*Members of the public can sign up to testify at the virtual public hearing via Zoom Web and/or via Phone at least 24 hours in advance of hearing at https://council.nyc.gov/testify/
Written testimony may be submitted up to 72 hours after hearing has been adjourned.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending:  Speaker Adams, Joseph and Cab√°n
